Package com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.swing.theme

Classes for standard icon themes as defined by www.freedesktop.org.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PThemeIconLoaderAbstract
    Abstract base class to load theme icons.
    PThemeIconLoaderAbstractFixedDimension
    Extends class PThemeIconLoaderAbstract with a fixed dimension for icons to load.
    PThemeIconLoaderFixedDimensionFromPngFile
    Implementation of PThemeIconLoaderAbstractFixedDimension to load PNG images from file.
    PThemeImageIcon
    Extends PImageIconAsync for standard themes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PThemeIconContextName
    Standard theme icon contexts (categories) as defined by www.freedesktop.org.
    PThemeIconName
    Standard theme icon names as defined by www.freedesktop.org.

Package com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.swing.theme Description

Classes for standard icon themes as defined by www.freedesktop.org. Inspired by two sources:
  • http://standards.freedesktop.org/icon-theme-spec/icon-theme-spec-latest.html
  • http://standards.freedesktop.org/icon-naming-spec/icon-naming-spec-latest.html

All class names begin with the letter 'P' for 'Papaya'.

This package is a part of the open-source Papaya Swing library.
